alert.note: Alert for Rensselaer; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:57PM EST until December 19 at 10:36PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River at Eagle Bridge. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, A dozen homes near Eagle Bridge evacuated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 PM EST Monday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Eagle Bridge Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 pm: 14.1 Forecast: Tue 1 am 14.3 Tue 7 am 13.2 Tue 1 pm 11.6 Tue 7 pm 10.6 Wed 1 am 9.8 Wed 7 am 9.0 Wed 1 pm 8.5 Wed 7 pm 8.0 Thu 1 am 7.5 Thu 7 am 7.0 Thu 1 pm 6.6 Thu 7 pm 6.2 &&
